com.twitter.heron.packing.builder

Class ContainerIdScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.packing.builder.ContainerIdScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scorer<Container>

    public class ContainerIdScorer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scorer<Container>
    Sorts containers ascending by container id. If firstId and maxId as passed, start with container with id firstId and ends with id firstId - 1, looping from max id back to lowest id.
